channel.title: Spider Solitaire
channel.description:
Has anyone ever played the game Spider Solitaire? It's right in the Games menu in XP (or vista?) and it's actually a lot of fun.
I've been playing it for the last month and I found the game difficult at first just on Easy. I got better and today, I finally beat the hard difficulty! http://img125.imageshack.us/img125/3784/spidersolitairehardmu4.png
If you have ever played the game, you will know that that game is VERY HARD to beat on hard! If you have never tried the game, try it! It's a lot of fun. :)

item.title: Spider Solitaire
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Easy - 1,920 wins 180 losses(This probably happened when I didn’t have internet connection for like 3 months).
Medium - 401 wins 207 losses
Hard - 29 wins 10 losses

I feel special

item.title: Spider Solitaire
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:2, topic:129190”]Well my mum plays it often and I played it for a while, I won something like 100 out of 200 on medium and then my sister who is 6 tryed hard and nearly one.
My mum has won the hard game about 3 times…
me, none…

so then my stats in a way are:
165/234 games won in easy mode.
123/196 games won in medium mode.
0/5 games won in hard mode.

I checked ;)[/quote]
HOW DU U CHECK?

Read full topic
